--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    col7 timestamp,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6,
        v7
    ),
    properties = (
        "prop1" = "val1",
        "prop2" = "val2"
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

set max_line_width 250;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_1 order by col0;

| col0                 | col1 | col2        | col3                                           | col4                                           | col5                                           | col6                       | col7                       |

| 1                    | 10   | 1000        | 1234.4321                                      | 12345678.99                                    | str1                                           | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 | 2021-01-01 01:00:00.000000 |

--multiple args;
execps 8 double 5234.4321 timestamp(6) "2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456" tinyint 50 timestamp(0) "2021-01-05 01:00:00" decimal(10,2) 52345678.99 int 5000 bigint 5 varchar "str5" "select * from test_source_1 where col3 = ? and col6 = ? and col1 = ? and col7 = ? and col4 = ? and col2 = ? and col0 = ? and col5 = ?";

--delete topic testtopic;
